summary: Adds Saber From Fate/Stay Night as follower. Standalone (CBBE & UNP)
descriptionHtml:
~[+:Thank you for all downloads and endorsements up until today~^^ :+]~

(Share your screenies of you and Saber throughout your travels in Skyrim!)

We have Saber's Excalibur mod, we have Saber's Armor mod, but where's Saber herself?... =3

=UPDATE=
Version 1.1 FIX Patch: Corrected hair texture's path, added some perks and shouts for her to use as skills (Really busy at the moment, thus the unforgivably late fix...Truly sorry, guys! >.<) APPLY ONLY AFTER INSTALLING THE MAIN FILES. Overwrite .esp file when prompt.

Version 1.1: Enhanced textures and models for Saber's armor (used Fizban007's Saber's armor), Reduced weight to 10.00 (to reduce clipping issue on neck when using Fizban007's armor), More Glorious texture for Excalibur.

Fizban007's Armor (Version 1.1):
[IMG]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/21650-1-1344327545.jpg[/IMG]
(NOTE: There's a minor problem in using Fizban007's version of armor. Apparently Fizban007 has no body slider support for his armor. So in order to reduce the clipping issue in the neck, you need to use the 'setnpcweight' console command after clicking on her and set it to 0. HOWEVER, by doing the above instruction (setting Saber's weight to 0), a minor clipping issue on her hair texture will occur which makes it look less smooth. To fix the hair issue, set back her weight 50.
Basically, Version 1.1 is a trade between looking good for the armor OR the hair...) >.<

JackGa's armor (Version1.0):
[IMG]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/21650-1-1344073945.jpg[/IMG]
JackGa's armor version (version 1.0) is considered the "safe" version, the only drawback is the texture is low resolution... =P

=Description=
This mod adds Saber Arthuria Pendragon from Fate/Stay Night as a marriageable companion. She uses Two-handed weapons (obviously). She is located in Whiterun's Dragonsreach 2nd Floor (Since I can't think of anywhere suitable to throw her...=P) treating herself like the King she's supposed to be~ XD
She is equipped with her Excalibur and Armor (included in the mod).

NOTE: Her armor and Excalibur are PURELY COSMETIC (it still serve as weapon and armor, but can't be enchanted or upgraded. They're still strong as her armor is equivalent to Dragonbone Plate set and Excalibur is equivalent to Daedric Greatsword). This is due respects to the original authors of the armor and Excalibur (JackGa/Fizban007 for armor & 1096Bimu w/ Kadaj7412 for Excalibur). If you want the quality versions of these equipment, you can find them here in Nexus (Links will be provided in 'Credits' section)~ =)

=Requirements=
None, but your Skyrim MUST BE UPDATED TO THE LATEST PATCH.

=Not Required but HIGHLY Recommended=
Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019
(To make Saber be more talkative instead of a soulless husk following you around)
My home is your home: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18045
(To set change her default location to somewhere else other than her throne, i.e Whiterun's Bannered Mare so you won't have any trouble finding her after being dismissed)
Ultimate Follower Overhaul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
(Use command "You know..." -> "You could dress better" to change her default outfit into nothing)
Magical Markers: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17483
(Give this to her before dismissing her to know where she is after being dismissed)

=Installation=
Drop all the files in Skyrim/Data folder
ADDITIONAL NOTES: In case you already have or going to install JackGa's/Fizban007's & Kadaj7412's mods, don't worry about any conflicts since the textures and meshes are the exact same files.

=Conflicts & Bugs=
Should be none but may be possible with any mods that alters Dragonsreach interior.
On rare occasions, she might not appear where she supposed to be on first encounter. To fix this, simply save your game, quit game, and restart your game and load the save.

=Future Plans=
Excalibur: Sword Of Promised Victory Noble Phantasm spell for her
(As soon as I can make it work...==")

=Credits=
JackGa for Saber's Armor (Version 1.0): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19674
Fizban007 for Saber's Armor (Version 1.1): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10154
Kadaj7412 & 1096Bimu for Saber's Excalibur: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13929
radioragae for Saber's Hair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110
Hhaley for Fair Skin: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666
DD Akt for Univision Face: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569
tktk1 for Enhanced Character Edit: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

=My Other Works=
-Follower- Berserker Lancelot from Fate/Zero: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22452
-Follower- Sylmeria of the StormCloaks: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20412
Dark Brotherhood's Babette Replacer -DAWNGUARD SUPPORTED-: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20460
-Follower- Vampire Eileen REWORKED STANDALONE EDITION : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20521

*P/S: If experienced any bugs, please report immediately~ Thank you for your cooperation~! =)
author: ZReincarnation
